column17:
This attractive bread basket from Mangrove will add style to your dining table. It is crafted from stainless steel and has a contemporary design. In round shape and with round cut out detailing it will make your breakfast more amazing everyday.

Features
  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Colour: Silver
  • Type: Bread Basket
  • Pattern: Solid with cut out detailing
  • Dimension (Height in inches): 3
  • Content: 1 piece bread basket

Care Instructions:
Use a soft scrubber and clean the utensils with baking soda or ground-up lemon peel
